hero.headline: Shipment tracking with a full
hero.subheadline: LogiPack is an internal operations console for logistics teams. Track shipments across offices, manage access by role, and inspect every change in a chronological timeline.
wyg.headline: What you get
wyg.subheadline: Four pillars of the LogiPack operations console.
wyg.shipment_timeline.headline: Shipment timeline
wyg.shipment_timeline.description: Chronological audit of every event - who changed what, when.
wyg.shipment_timeline.label: Core Feature
wyg.office_aware_tracking.headline: Office-aware tracking
wyg.office_aware_tracking.description: See the current office, track handoffs between locations.
wyg.role_based_consoles.headline: Role-based consoles
wyg.role_based_consoles.description: Separate capabilities for employees and administrators.
wyg.admin_management.headline: Admin management
wyg.admin_management.description: Manage clients, offices, employees, and assignments.
hiw.headline: How it works
hiw.subheadline: Three steps from intake to accountability.
hiw.first_step.headline: Create or ingest
hiw.first_step.label: Created
hiw.second_step.headline: Move through statuses
hiw.second_step.description: Track across offices and status changes.
hiw.second_step.label: In transit
hiw.third_step.headline: Inspect the timeline
